definitions.definition: Love of one's country ; devotion to the welfare of one's compatriots ; passion which inspires one to serve one's country.
The desire to compete sharply with, and perhaps also dominate, other nations; nationalism .

main_definition: Love of one's country ; devotion to the welfare of one's compatriots ; passion which inspires one to serve one's country.
secondary_definitions: The desire to compete sharply with, and perhaps also dominate, other nations; nationalism .
